task.title: Reset your password
task.shortdesc: Use these steps to reset your account password safely.

prereq.p: You must know your account email and have access to it.
If you cannot sign in, start the password reset from the sign-in page.

step.cmd: Enter your account email and select Continue.
Open the verification email and copy the code.
Paste the code, create a new password, and select Save.

result.p: You are redirected to your account. Use the new password next time.

ul.li: Verify the email on your account.

dd.p: Request a new link from the sign-in page; links expire quickly for security.
Clear saved passwords in the browser/app and try the new password again.

postreq.p: Update saved passwords in browsers and apps.
